title: Suspension
body: My account has been permanently suspended and i have no idea why. I have no email as to the reasoning nor have i ever been suspended before. i last played three days ago and was fine but i try to play again today and my accounts been suspended. I have sent in a support ticket but i'm trying to get clarification on what i could've been suspended for. I hardly speak in chat let alone be toxic and i do not troll or leave games. Any ideas what would have gotten me from zero punishments to a permanent suspension?
